localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Heartface is a frictionless checkout that enables e-commerce for any product link; letting people shop multiple products from multiple stores without being redirected out of a referring website/app.
blogPost.body: Heartface is a frictionless checkout that enables e-commerce for any product link; letting people shop multiple products from multiple stores without being redirected out of a referring website/app.
blogPost.title: Heartface - One-click checkout for any product, enabled everywhere 😍
blogPost.author: Urvesh Vasani

localize.description: Heartface是一种无摩擦的结账方式，可以实现任何产品链接的电子商务；让人们从多家商店购买多个产品，而不会被重新定向到推荐网站/应用程序之外。
localize.tagline: 任何产品均可一键结账，支持Everywhere😍

localize.description: Heartface是一種無摩擦的結賬方式，可以實現任何產品鏈接的電子商務；讓人們從多家商店購買多個產品，而不會被重新定向到推薦網站/應用程序之外。
localize.tagline: 任何產品均可一鍵結賬，支持Everywhere😍

previous.excerpt: I want to request integration X is a common question we all get from customers as makers. The Voting Portal enables users and leads to request their favorite integrations. Try the free plan or get a 20% discount for the first 6 months on the paid plans.
previous.title: Voting Portal - Track integration requests and streamline your roadmap

localize.description: 我想请求集成X是我们作为制造商从客户那里得到的一个常见问题。投票门户使用户和潜在客户能够请求他们喜欢的集成。试用免费计划或在付费计划的前6个月获得20%的折扣。
localize.tagline: 跟踪集成请求并简化您的路线图

localize.description: 我想請求集成X是我們作爲製造商從客戶那裏得到的一個常見問題。投票門戶使用戶和潛在客戶能夠請求他們喜歡的集成。試用免費計劃或在付費計劃的前6個月獲得20%的折扣。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤集成請求並簡化您的路線圖

next.excerpt: Clubhouse is awesome for "I'm here, who can I listen to?", but not yet so awesome for scheduling future events and ensuring you don't miss your favorite mod. ====== YoYo helps moderators take their audience from 1 room to the next!
next.title: YoYo - Accelerate and own your Clubhouse audience

localize.description: Clubhouse对于 "我在这里，我可以听谁说话？"来说是很棒的，但对于安排未来的活动和确保你不会错过你最喜欢的版主来说，还不是那么棒。====== YoYo帮助版主将他们的听众从1个房间带到下一个房间。
localize.tagline: 加速发展并拥有您的会所观众

localize.description: Clubhouse對於 "我在這裏，我可以聽誰說話？"來說是很棒的，但對於安排未來的活動和確保你不會錯過你最喜歡的版主來說，還不是那麼棒。====== YoYo幫助版主將他們的聽衆從1個房間帶到下一個房間。
localize.tagline: 加速發展並擁有您的會所觀衆
